gameplay
Class Species

java.lang.Object
  gameplay.Species
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpeciesCarnivorous, SpeciesHerbivore
public abstract class Species
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Overview

The Species class contains informations about a species of dinosaurs owned by a player Species is the parent class of SpeciesCarnivorous and SpeciesHerbivore This includes:

  • Its current turn number
  • The list of dinosaurs
  • Its maximum size
  • The list of cells discovered
  • Its name
  • The player who owns it
  • Its score
  • Its maximum number of turns
